headline: Amphenol (APH): Assessing Valuation as Analyst Upgrades and AI Demand Drive Optimism
summary: If you have been watching Amphenol (APH) lately, there is good reason. The stock just sprinted to a new 52-week high, fueled by upbeat commentary from strategists and analysts on growing demand for the company’s AI and data center connectivity products. Recent upgrades and earnings surprises are putting Amphenol back on many investors’ radars, especially with the Andrew acquisition driving earnings higher than expected and making some wonder if more positive revisions are on the horizon. This...
